programme.title: A European Christmas
programme.desc: When Christmas movie director Ivy has another 'heartless' flop, she seeks the star of her debut hit in snowy Serbia. Despite refusing to return, he shows her the wonder of Serbian Christmas.

programme.title: The Fabric of Christmas
programme.desc: Liam and Amy team up to make a Christmas quilt for Liam's sister's wedding.

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: Maggie Mason, a runaway bride, does some soul-searching when she's trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.

programme.title: Runaway Christmas Bride
programme.desc: A runaway bride makes herself scarce at a winter resort, where she meets a charming ski patrol rescuer. Just when she begins to believe in love again, her jilted fiance arrives at the resort.

programme.title: A Merry Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A wedding planner pulled in for a last-minute royal wedding on Christmas Day is shocked to discover the groom is the alluring stranger she met before.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica must learn to step outside her shell and challenge her inhibitions.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica returns to her brother Leo's death.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica quits therapy and Dr. Naadiah sends her back to a bar where she meets a troubled Dr. Tom.

programme.title: Royally Yours, This Christmas
programme.desc: A royal prince falls in love with a single mother and hotel housekeeper at Christmastime after he mistakes her for a wealthy hotel guest.

programme.title: A European Christmas
programme.desc: When Christmas movie director Ivy has another 'heartless' flop, she seeks the star of her debut hit in snowy Serbia. Despite refusing to return, he shows her the wonder of Serbian Christmas.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas in the English countryside isn't in Emma's plans until her sister, Amy, plans her wedding for Christmas eve. Dylan, Amy's Christmas market co-owner, teams up with Emma to bring order to the whirlwind wedding.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, a New York installation designer is tasked with helping a small, rural community compete in a "Best Christmas Village" festival. She is forced to work with a wealthy, heir who sees Christmas as an inconvenience.

programme.title: Saving Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: An archaeologist lets Christmas magic into her heart and finds both history and love.
